1.verse: Chapter 1 -Prologue -An Authentic Communion of Life -This is what we proclaim to you:what existed from the beginning,what we have heard,what we have seen with our own eyes,what we have looked atand touched with our hands—we are speaking of the Word of life.

2.verse: That life was made visible;we have seen it and bear witness,proclaiming to you the eternal lifethat was with the Fatherand was revealed to us.

3.verse: What we have seen and heardwe declare to youso that you may have fellowship with us.For our fellowship is with the Fatherand with his Son Jesus Christ.

4.verse: We are writing thisso that our joy may be complete.

5.verse: Walk in the Light -God Is Light -This is the messagethat we have heard from himand that we declare to you:God is light,and there is no darkness at all in him.

6.verse: If we claim that we have fellowship with himwhile we continue to live in darkness,we are lying and do not live in the truth.

7.verse: However, if we live in the lightas he himself is in the light,then we have fellowship with one another,and the blood of Jesus his Sonpurifies us from all sin.

8.verse: Deliverance from Sin -If we claim that we are sinless,we are only deceiving ourselves,and the truth is not in us.

9.verse: However, if we confess our sins,he who is faithful and justwill forgive our sinsand cleanse us from all wrongdoing.

10.verse: If we say that we have never sinned,we make him out to be a liar,and his word is not in us.

1.verse: Chapter 2 -My dear children,I am writing this to youso that you may avoid committing sin.However, if anyone does sin,we have an Advocate with the Father,Jesus Christ, the Righteous One.

2.verse: He is himself the sacrifice for our sins—and not only for our sinsbut also for the sins of the whole world.

3.verse: The Commandment of Love -Now we may be certain that we know himif we obey his commandments.

4.verse: Whoever says, “I know him,”but does not keep his commandments,is a liar,and the truth is not in him.

5.verse: However, the love of God is truly perfectedin the one who obeys his word.This is how we can be certainthat we are in union with him:

6.verse: whoever claims to abide in himmust live just as he himself lived.

7.verse: Beloved,I am not writing a new commandment for you,but an old commandmentthat you have had from the beginning.The old commandment is the wordthat you have heard.

8.verse: And yet I am writing you a new commandment,whose truth is in him and in you,because the darkness is passing awayand the true light is already shining.

9.verse: Whoever says, “I am in the light,”yet hates his brother,is still in the darkness.

10.verse: Whoever loves his brother lives in the light,and there is nothing in himto make him stumble.

11.verse: Whoever hates his brother is in the darkness,and he walks about in darkness.He does not know where he is goingbecause the darkness has blinded him.

12.verse: The Concupiscences of the World -I am writing to you, dear children,because your sins have been forgivenon account of his name.

13.verse: I am writing to you, fathers,because you have known himwho has existed from the beginning.I am writing to you, young people,because you have conquered the evil one.

14.verse: I am writing to you, dear children,because you have known the Father.I am writing to you, fathers,because you have known himwho has existed from the beginning.I am writing to you, young people,because you are strong,and the word of God abides in you,and you have overcome the evil one.

15.verse: Do not love the worldor what is in the world.If anyone does love the world,the love of the Father is not in him.

16.verse: For everything that is in the world—the concupiscence of the flesh,the concupiscence of the eyes,and the pride of life—comes not from the Fatherbut from the world.

17.verse: And the world with all its enticementsis passing away,but whoever does the will of Godabides forever.

18.verse: Behold the Antichrist -Dear children,this is the last hour.You have heard that the Antichrist was coming,and now many antichrists have already come.Thus, we knowthat it is the final hour.

19.verse: They went out from us,but they never really belonged to us.If they had belonged to us,they would have remained with us.By departing from us,they made it clearthat none of them belonged to us.

20.verse: However, you have been anointedby the Holy One,and you all have knowledge.

21.verse: I write to younot because you do not know the truthbut because you do know it,and because no lie can come from the truth.

22.verse: Who is the liarbut the one who denies that Jesus is the Christ?The antichrist isanyone who denies both the Father and the Son.

23.verse: Whoever denies the Sondoes not have the Father,but whoever acknowledges the Sonhas the Father also.

24.verse: Let what you heard from the beginningremain in you.If what you heard from the beginningremains in you,then you will remain in the Sonand in the Father

25.verse: And this is the promise he made to us:eternal life.

26.verse: I write these things to youin reference to thosewho seek to lead you astray.

27.verse: But as for you,the anointing you received from himremains in you,and therefore you do not need anyoneto teach you.This same anointingteaches you everythingand is true and not false,so abide in him just as he taught you.

28.verse: And now, dear children,abide in him,so that when he appearswe may have confidenceand not be put to shame by himat his coming.

29.verse: Children of God -Everyone Whose Life Is Righteous Has Been Born of God -If you know that he is righteous,you also know that everyone whose life is righteousis born of him.

1.verse: Chapter 3 -See what lovethe Father has bestowed on us,enabling us to be called the children of God,and that is what we are.If the world does not recognize us,that is because it did not know him.

2.verse: Beloved,we are God’s children now.What we shall behas not yet been revealed.However, we do know that when he appearswe shall be like him,for we shall see him as he really is.

3.verse: Everyone who has this hope in himkeeps himself pure,just as he is pure.

4.verse: The Rupture with Sin -Everyone who sins breaks the law,for sin is lawlessness.

5.verse: You know that he appearedin order to take away sins,and that there is no sin in him.

6.verse: Whoever remains in him does not sin,and whoever sins has not seen himnor known him.

7.verse: Dear children,do not let anyone deceive you.Everyone who does what is right is righteous,just as he is righteous.

8.verse: Everyone who sins comes from the devil,for the devil has been a sinnerfrom the very beginning.The Son of God appeared for this very purpose:to destroy the work of the devil.

9.verse: Whoever is born of Goddoes not sin,because his seed remains in him.He cannot sinbecause he is begotten by God.

10.verse: This is what distinguishesthe children of God from the children of the devil:anyone who fails to live righteouslydoes not belong to God;neither does anyone who fails to love a brother.

11.verse: The Message of Love -For from the beginningyou have heard the messagethat we should love one another,

12.verse: unlike Cain who was from the evil oneand slew his brother.And why did he slay him?Because his own deeds were evilwhile those of his brother were righteous.

13.verse: Do not be surprised, my brethren,if the world hates you.

14.verse: We know that we have passedfrom death to lifebecause we love our brethren.Whoever does not love remains in death.

15.verse: Anyone who hates his brotheris a murderer,and you know that no murdererhas eternal life abiding in him.

16.verse: This is how we know what love is:he laid down his life for us,and we in turn must be preparedto lay down our lives for our brethren.

17.verse: If anyone is rich in worldly possessionsand sees a brother in needbut refuses to open his heart,how can the love of God abide in him?

18.verse: Dear children,let us love not in word or speechbut in deed and truth.

19.verse: This is how we knowthat we belong to the truthand reassure our hearts in his presence

20.verse: even if our hearts experience a sense of guilt.For God is greater than our hearts,and he knows everything.

21.verse: Beloved,if our hearts do not condemn us,we can approach God with confidence

22.verse: and receive from him whatever we ask,because we obey his commandmentsand do whatever is pleasing to him.

23.verse: And this is his commandment:that we should believein the name of his Son, Jesus Christ,and love one another just as he commanded us.

24.verse: All those who keep his commandments abide in him,and he abides in them.And the proof that he abides in usis the Spirit that he has given us.

1.verse: Chapter 4 -The Spirit of the Antichrist in the World -Beloved,do not trust every spirit,but test the spiritsto see whether they are from God.For many false prophetshave gone out into the world.

2.verse: This is how you can recognize the Spirit of God:every spirit that acknowledgesthat Jesus Christ has come in the fleshis from God,

3.verse: and every spirit that does not acknowledge Jesusis not from God.This is the spirit of the Antichrist,about whose coming you have been told,and that it is already in the world.

4.verse: Dear children,you are from Godand you have conquered them,for the one who is in you is greaterthan the one who is in the world.

5.verse: They are from the world;therefore, what they say is from the world,and the world listens to them.

6.verse: We are from God.Anyone who knows God listens to us,while anyone who is not from Godrefuses to listen to us.This is how we can distinguishthe spirit of truth from the spirit of falsehood.

7.verse: Remain in Love -What Love Is -Beloved,let us love one another,because love is from God.Everyone who loves is born of God and knows God.

8.verse: Whoever does not lovedoes not know God,because God is love.

9.verse: God’s love was revealed to us in this way:God sent his only-begotten Son into the worldso that we might have life through him.

10.verse: This is what love is:not that we have loved God,but that he loved usand sent his Son as expiation for our sins.

11.verse: Beloved,since God loved us so much,we should love one another.

12.verse: No one has ever seen God,but if we love one another,God abides in us,and his love is made complete in us.

13.verse: This is how we can be certainthat we abide in himand that he abides in us:he has given us a share in his Spirit.

14.verse: Moreover, we have seen for ourselvesand can testifythat the Father has sent the Sonas the Savior of the world.

15.verse: God abides in anyone who acknowledgesthat Jesus is the Son of God,and that person abides in God.

16.verse: We have come to knowand to believe inthe love that God has for us.God is love,and whoever abides in loveabides in God,and God in him.

17.verse: This is how love is made perfect in us,enabling us to have confidenceon the Day of Judgment,because even in this worldwe have become like him.

18.verse: In love there is no fear;indeed, perfect love casts out fear,because fear has to do with punishment,and whoever fearshas not yet achieved perfection in love.

19.verse: Therefore, we love because he first loved us.

20.verse: If someone says, “I love God,”but at the same time hates his brother,he is a liar.For whoever does not love the brotherwhom he has seencannot love God whom he has not seen.

21.verse: This is the commandmentwe have received from him:whoever loves Godmust also love his brother.

1.verse: Chapter 5 -Believe in the Son of God -Faith Conquers the World -Everyone who believesthat Jesus is the Christis born of God,and everyone who loves the parentloves the one begotten of him as well.

2.verse: This is how we knowthat we love the children of God:by loving God and obeying his commandments.

3.verse: For the love of God is this:that we keep his commandments.And his commandments are not burdensome,

4.verse: for everyone born of Godconquers the world.And the victory that conquers the worldis our faith.

5.verse: Who indeed conquers the worldexcept the one who believesthat Jesus is the Son of God?

6.verse: This is the onewho came by water and blood,Jesus Christ—not by water alone,but by water and blood.And to this the Spirit bears witness,for the Spirit is truth.

8.verse: the Spirit, the water, and the blood,and these three are as one.

9.verse: If we accept human testimony,the testimony of God is greater.For it is the testimony of God,the testimony that he has given about his Son.

10.verse: Whoever believes in the Son of Godhas this testimony in himself,but those who do not believe in Godhave made him out to be a liarby refusing to believe the testimonythat God has given about his Son.

11.verse: And this is the testimony:God gave us eternal life,and this life is in his Son.

12.verse: Whoever possesses the Sonpossesses life;whoever does not possess the Son of Goddoes not possess life.

13.verse: Epilogue -So That You May Know -I write these things to youwho believe in the name of the Son of Godso that you may knowthat you have eternal life.

14.verse: Prayer for Sinners -And thus we can have confidence in himthat if we ask anythingthat is in accordance with his will,he hears us.

15.verse: And if we know that he hears usin regard to whatever we ask him,we may be surethat all we ask of him will be ours.

16.verse: If anyone sees a brother commit a sinthat does not lead to death,he should intercede for him,and God will grant him life—provided that the sin is not deadly.There is a sin that leads to death,and I do not saythat you should pray about it.

17.verse: All wrongdoing is sinful,but not all sins are deadly.

18.verse: The Great Certitudes -We know that one born of God does not continue to sin,because he who is born of God protects him,and the evil one has no power over him.

19.verse: We knowthat we are from Godand that the entire worldlies under the power of the evil one.

20.verse: We also knowthat the Son of God has comeand given us understandingso that we can know the one who is true.And we are in the one who is true,since we are in his Son Jesus Christ.He is the true God and eternal life.
